titles.title: TASK Act
TASK Act
Training Assignments for Student Knowledge Act
To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to provide that services performed by certain individuals in postsecondary vocational institutions not be treated as employment.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
Training Assignments for Student Knowledge Act or the TASK Act
This bill excludes from the definition of an employee under the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 an individual who performs services required by a postsecondary vocational institution.
